# 前世今生

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/qianshi-jinsheng
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/qianshi-jinsheng
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install qianshi-jinsheng
qianshi-jinsheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g qianshi-jinsheng
qianshi-jinsheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
